a-na LUGAL EN-ia₂ ARAD-ka {1}man-nu-ki-{URU}ni-nu-a lu DI-mu a-na LUGAL EN-a DI-mu a-na KUR ša LUGAL EN-a ina UGU {URU}zab-ga-ga-a.a ša LUGAL EN iš-pur-an-ni ma-a ša₂-al a-mur E₂ e-ra-bu-u-nu u₂-ṣu-u-ni šu-up-ra u₂-ma-a TA@v E₂ {1}dal-ta-a i-su-hu-ru-u-ni ina {URU}ku-lu-man TA@v ŠEŠ-MEŠ-šu₂-nu e-tar-bu kam-mu-su u₃ ki-i al-lik-u-ni a-de-e TA@v {URU}ku-lu-man-a.a aš₂-kun-u-ni u₂-sa-li-mu-ša₂-nu-ni šu-nu is-se-e-ša₂-nu-ma i-sa-al-mu ina UGU {URU}zab-ga-ga i-tah-ru-u-ni ma-a EN-URU-in-ni EN-URU-in-ni sa-hi-ri ina UGU-hi-ni še-ši-ib ki-i ša LUGAL EN iš-pur-an-ni aq-ṭi₂-ba-šu₂-nu mu-ku EN-URU-ku-nu EN-URU-ku-nu LUGAL it-ti-ši x x x x x x x {LU₂}mat-a.a i-ṣa-bat-su x+x x x x ša {URU}za-ab-ga-ga x x x x x x x x x a-da-nak-ku-nu x x x x x x x x x-ir-ku-nu x x x x x x x x x mu x x nu x x x x x x x x x+x x+x x x x x+x a x+x x x x x x x+x x x x x a-qa-ba-šu₂-nu-ni iq-ṭi-bi-u ma-a x x x a-na u₂-ṣe-e TA@v {URU}ku-lu-man x x x x ša {1}as-ru-ka-ni u₃ ša x x x x x x x-ir ša {URU}si-ik-ri-si i-sa-x x x x x x a-na DI-mu {LU₂}A-KIN-MEŠ-ni-šu₂-nu {LU₂}A-KIN-MEŠ-ni-šu₂-nu x x TA@v pa-ni-ia la i-ba-tu₂-qu ku-zip-pi SA₅-MEŠ u₂-sa-bi-su-nu HAR-MEŠ KUG.UD a-sa-kan-šu₂-nu u₃ ki-i an-ni-e aq-ṭi₂-ba-šu₂-nu mu-ku ki-i ša ti-ma-li šal-ši-UD-me pa-an {1}{d}PA-EN-GIN ta-zi-za-ni mi-i-ni ša ṭe₃-e-mu-un-ni tah-ru-ṣa-ni ta-aq-ba-šu₂-nu mu-ku u₂-ma-a ki-i an-nim-ma ina pa-ni-ia i-ti-sa mu-ku mi-i-ni ṭe₃-e-mu ša {LU₂}mat-a.a ša ta-šam-ma-ni šup-ra-ni mu-ku ki-i ša {1}{d}PA-EN-GIN iṣ-ru-ka-nu-u-ni a-na-ku a-na-ṣar-ku-nu u₃ di-ib-bi-ku-nu SIG₅-MEŠ ina pa-an LUGAL EN-a a-qa-ab-bi u₃ šu-nu ki-i an-ni-i iq-ṭi₂-bu-u-ni ma-a LUGAL ṭe₃-e-mu i-sa-kan-a-na-ši ma-a ina pa-an {LU₂}EN.NAM ša {URU}kar-{1}MAN-GIN i-ti-sa ma-a u₂-ma-a ina pa-ni-ka-ma ni-za-az ma-a {LU₂}ARAD-MEŠ ša LUGAL a-ne₂-e-nu x x x x x x x x x ša {1}{d}PA-EN-GIN x x x x x x x x a-sa-pa-ra nu-ku x x x x x x x ina pa-ni-ia x x x x x x x x x is-se-e-ni x x x x x x x x šu-uk-nu x x x x x-MEŠ-ni nu-x x u₃ ma-a at-ta TA@v x x-ka al-ka ma-a ina re-eš {URU}sa-tar-ni a-de-e is-se-e-ni šu-uk-nu ma-a ni-si-lim u₂-ma-a an-nu-rig di-ib-bi DUG₃.GA-MEŠ is-se-e-šu₂-nu a-da-bu-ub a-du mi-i-ni ša LUGAL EN i-šap-par-u-ni
